item.title: Command HELP!
item.dc:creator: @statsflamescape statsflamescape
item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

I have these 2 commands to teleport people to a skilling area, to different places.
These are my commands:

if (command.startsWith("skiller") && playerRights >= 0) { toX = 3356; toY = 3344; sM("@gre@Welcome to the Vehiron X skilling area #1!"); } if (command.startsWith("skiller2") && playerRights >= 0) { toX = 2854; toY = 3434; sM("@whi@Welcome to the Vehiron X skilling area #2!"); }
When I teleport to skiller (the first one) it sends the message: Welcome to the Vehiron X skilling area #1
but when i teleport to skiller2 is sends the message:Welcome to the Vehiron X skilling area #1
and :Welcome to the Vehiron X skilling area #2

Read full topic
